perturbation.original_text:
Contribution by Sponsor:
In consideration for the right to sponsor the Kaya Fest and to be acknowledged by Fruit of Life Productions LLC., as a Promoter of the event
during the term of this Agreement, Sponsor agrees to contract with Fruit of Life Productions LLC., for the amount of $250,000.00 to be paid in full
upon signing of this agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
Contribution by Sponsor:
In consideration for the right to sponsor the Kaya Fest and to be acknowledged by Fruit of Life Productions LLC., as a Promoter of the event
during the term of this Agreement, Sponsor agrees to contract with Fruit of Life Productions LLC., for the amount of $250,000.00 to be paid with an initial payment of $50,000 upon signing of this agreement, and the remaining $200,000 based on milestones to be agreed upon.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces ambiguity regarding the payment terms. Initially, the full amount was due upon signing. Now, the payment is split with unspecified milestones, conflicting with the original immediate payment requirement. This creates an internal contradiction concerning when and how the Sponsor fulfills their financial obligation.

perturbation.original_text:
Terms and Termination:
The term of this agreement will begin on April 1, 2018 and continue until April 30, 2018 at 11:59pm.
perturbation.changed_text:
Terms and Termination:
The term of this agreement will begin on April 1, 2018 and continue for one year, automatically renewing unless either party provides written notice of termination 30 days prior to the renewal date. However, Eco Science Solutions, Inc. reserves the right to terminate this agreement at any time.
perturbation.explanation: This creates conflicting terms regarding the agreement's duration and termination. The original agreement has a fixed term, while the modified agreement introduces automatic renewal and allows Eco Science Solutions, Inc. to terminate at any time, creating a contradiction. This impacts the Sponsor's expected period of benefits.

perturbation.original_text:
Intellectual Property:
Fruit of Life Productions LLC is the sole owner of all right, title and interest to all Kaya Fest information including Logo, tag lines, (Education before
Recreation), Trademarks, trade names and copyrighted information. Sponsor agrees that it will not use Kaya Fest property in a manner that states or
implies that Kaya Fest endorses Sponsor (or Sponsors products or services) without written approval from Fruit of Life Productions LLC.
perturbation.changed_text:
Intellectual Property:
Fruit of Life Productions LLC is the sole owner of all right, title and interest to all Kaya Fest information including Logo, tag lines, (Education before
Recreation), Trademarks, trade names and copyrighted information. However, Eco Science Solutions, Inc. shall have the right to utilize Kaya Fest logo and marketing materials, without written consent, for promotional purposes relating to the Kaya Fest event.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an internal contradiction regarding the use of Kaya Fest intellectual property. The original text requires written approval for the Sponsor to use Kaya Fest property in a manner that implies endorsement. The modified version grants Eco Science Solutions, Inc. the right to use logos and marketing materials without written consent for promotional activities, conflicting with the prior requirement. This ambiguity could lead to disputes regarding the scope of permitted use.
